title: The Gauntlet of Feona
description: Davydd Tardust's exceptional skills with the bow and arrow and sleight of hand have ensured he and his father's survival in the Kingdom of Angweleth, which has been stretched by war. On a routine hunt, he encounters a decimated caravan and its lone survivor - a beautiful young lady with an air of mystery about her.Princess Vannera does not look like herself. A necessary switch has taken place in order to ensure her survival after her royal caravan was destroyed by beastly marauders. Together with the man who rescues her from the ruins of her chariot, she uncovers a long-hidden truth about her kingdom, the rightful heir to its throne and the great evil that plots its return to finish what it could not, twenty-three years ago - destroy the human race.To stop impending doom, Davydd and Vannera must set out on a quest to find a long-lost gauntlet of power before the malevolent Dragol does so first. But the quest to save the human race reveals another unexpected treasure neither of them saw coming. True Love.The Gauntlet of Feona is a fantastic new adventure that channels the creative spirits of J.R.R Tolkien, Christopher Paolini and Terry Goodkind.
author: Kelechi Agu
